EmissionsAllocation.name: EmissionsAllocation
EmissionsAllocation.description: Represents information about the emissions from a child or partner account that are allocated to an account.

AllocatedFromAccountId.description: The child or partner account from which the emissions are allocated to the parent account.

AllocatedFromGhgCategory.description: Specifies the GHG category of the child or partner account from which the emissions are allocated to the parent account.

AllocatedFromScope.description: Specifies the scope of the child or partner account from which the emissions are allocated to the parent account.

AllocatedToAccountId.description: The parent account to which the emissions are allocated.

AllocatedToGhgCategory.description: Specifies the GHG category of the parent account to which the emissions are allocated.

AllocatedToScope.description: Specifies the scope of the parent account to which the emissions are allocated.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name for this energy use record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

Percentage.description: The percentage of emissions from a child or partner account that are allocated to the parent account.
